extension.summary: Tvheadend: a TV streaming server for Linux
extension.description: Tvheadend (4.3.1986): is a TV streaming server for Linux supporting DVB-S/S2, DVB-C, DVB-T/T2, IPTV, SAT>IP, ATSC and ISDB-T
extension.news:
102 - Update to 4.3-1979 - include missing x254 library for Generic
101 - Update to 4.3-1967
100 - initial LibreELEC version

extension.summary: OSCam: an Open Source Conditional Access Modul
extension.description: OSCam(11704) is a software to be used to decrypt digital television channels, as an alternative for a conditional access module.
extension.news:
110 - Update to version 11681
109 - Update to version 11518 - fixed missing Modules
108 - Update to version 11517
107 - Update to version 11487
106 - Update to version 11431
105 - Update to version 11420 - add SSL support
104 - Update to version 11391
103 - Update to version 11350
102 - fix the delayed start workaround
101 - Update to version 11233 - fix the WeTek_Play problems
100 - Update for LibreELEC 8.0

extension.description: Download and install YLLOW_DRAGON addons repository.
Загружайте и устанавливайте дополнения из репозитория YLLOW_DRAGON.
Завантажуйте та встановлюйте доповненя з репозиторію YLLOW_DRAGON.
